input_query:
TASK: You need to schedule a meeting for Wayne and Megan for half an hour between the work hours of 9:00 to 17:00 on Monday. 

Here are the existing schedules for everyone during the day: 
Wayne has no meetings the whole day.
Megan has meetings on Monday during 9:00 to 9:30, 10:00 to 14:00, 14:30 to 17:00; 

Megan do not want to meet on Monday after 11:00. Find a time that works for everyone's schedule and constraints.
